name: Jim K.
longTestimonial: Jerry and Joan are terrific to work with.  They have a wonderful selection in their gallery, and they take time to learn your interests to aide in the selection of a great piece of art.
shortTestimonial: Jerry and Joan are terrific to work with.  They have a wonderful selection in their gallery, and they take time to learn your interests to aide in the selection of a great piece of art.
